article_title: Better know a CSO: Indiana University Health’s Mitch Parker
article_description: Mitch Parker has one of Indiana s most critical jobs  As chief information security officer for Indiana University Health  Parker oversees cybersecurity for more than 30 000 employees at 18 hospitals across the state  along with countless numbers of computers
